Pre-Game Insights: The Spurs are 15-13 in conference games.
The Nuggets have gone 12-10 against Western Conference opponents.
The Spurs are shooting 45.7% from the field this season, 1.2 percentage points lower than the 46.9% the Nuggets allow to opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nikola Jokic scored 41 points in the Nuggets' 113-110 loss to the San Antonio Spurs.
Victor Wembanyama paces the Spurs with 10.3 boards.
Michael Porter Jr. is averaging 18.9 points and 6.4 rebounds for the Nuggets.
Chris Paul is averaging 9.4 points, 8.4 assists and 1.5 steals for the Spurs.
The Nuggets average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.5 fewer made shots on average than the 13.3 per game the Spurs give up.
Others: Jeremy Sochan is day to day (back) for the Spurs.
Aaron Gordon is day to day (calf) for the Nuggets.
DaRon Holmes II is out for the season (achilles) for the Nuggets.
Vlatko Cancar is out (knee) for the Nuggets.
